title: Spa
activity:
At Alpine Heights Resort, we believe in providing our guests with the ultimate relaxation experience. Our state-of-the-art sauna is designed to help you unwind and rejuvenate after a day of adventure in the mountains.

Benefits of the Sauna

Detoxification: Sweating in the sauna helps to flush out toxins from your body, promoting overall health and well-being.

Muscle Relaxation: The heat from the sauna soothes sore muscles and joints, making it an ideal way to recover after skiing, snowboarding, or hiking.

Improved Circulation: Regular sauna sessions can improve blood circulation, which helps to reduce muscle tension and promote healing.

Stress Relief: The tranquil environment of the sauna provides a perfect escape from the hustle and bustle, allowing you to relax and de-stress.

Sauna Features

Modern Design: Our sauna features a sleek, modern design with comfortable seating and ambient lighting to create a serene atmosphere.
Temperature Control: Easily adjust the temperature to your preference for a personalized experience.
Aromatherapy: Enhance your sauna session with a selection of essential oils, designed to promote relaxation and well-being.

How to Use the Sauna

Preparation: Before entering the sauna, take a quick shower to cleanse your skin. This helps to open your pores and maximize the benefits of the heat.

Duration: We recommend starting with a 10-15 minute session. Listen to your body and take breaks as needed.

Hydration: Drink plenty of water before and after your sauna session to stay hydrated.

Booking and Availability Our sauna is available to all guests of Alpine Heights Resort. You can book a session through our concierge service or directly via our mobile app. Whether you’re looking to relax after a day on the slopes or simply want to enjoy some quiet time, our sauna is the perfect place to unwind.
